thread.title: Viewsroom: Chipmaker battle fries M&A circuits

author: Antony Currie
title: Viewsroom: Chipmaker battle fries M&A circuits
text:
NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Broadcom has lowered its hostile bid for Qualcomm after its target upped its longstanding offer for NXP. That decreases the chance the two larger rivals can strike a deal – assuming regulators wouldn’t nuke it. Plus: Credit Suisse shines a rare light on Asian investment banking.
Breakingviews Reuters Breakingviews is the world's leading source of agenda-setting financial insight. As the Reuters brand for financial commentary, we dissect the big business and economic stories as they break around the world every day.
